description: For times when you can't just hunker down and wait it out, the Exposure/2™ PACLITE® Pant is Mountain Hardwear's versatile, full-featured rain pant that keeps you dry and on the move. Featuring 100% recycled, waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX® PACLITE® fabric that's fully taped, highly compressible, and incredibly lightweight, these streamlined pants are the ideal wet-weather insurance policy for big day hikes, multi-day backpacking, and other inclement trail forays.
name: Mountain Hardwear Exposure/2 GTX Paclite Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: GORE-TEX® PACLITE® 2L Recycled Plain Weave - 100% recycled polyester
